Specimen Type: Fine-needle aspirated cellular material (smears, residual fluid)
Purpose: To process, examine, and report cytology FNA samples for diagnostic evaluation of benign or malignant disease.
Container: Properly labeled glass slides or leak-proof container with Cytolyt/transport media
Equipment: Light microscope, centrifuge, cytology stainer (Diff-Quik and Pap), paraffin embedding and sectioning instruments
